title: Amy's World
description: He traveled halfway around the world to save her -- and found the love that would save them both.Corey Winslow returns to his home town as a war hero, but he’s haunted by the memory of the Iraqi woman he was unable to save. When he reunites with his childhood friend, Amy Spencer, he remembers how she comforted him during his parents’ divorce. With Amy, he can relax and find hope that he will eventually heal. But when tragedy strikes, Corey learns the connection between the mysterious Iraqi stranger, and the woman he is fated to love.
author: Cindi Myers
